entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 22.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
